com.rift.coad.lib.common
Class ObjectSerializer.ClassLoaderObjectInputStream

java.lang.Object

      java.io.ObjectInputStream
          com.rift.coad.lib.common.ObjectSerializer.ClassLoaderObjectInputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Closeable, java.io.DataInput, java.io.ObjectInput, java.io.ObjectStreamConstants
Enclosing class:
ObjectSerializer
public static class ObjectSerializer.ClassLoaderObjectInputStream
extends java.io.ObjectInputStream

This class overrides the resolve to use the class loader on the thread to find the specified class.
